body.p: Horizontal dividing lines or decorated dividing elements between text passages are tagged by using the <milestone> element:
Only separators between text passages or at the end of a section are taken into account. Separation lines between the text and the footnote area/header are not taken into account.

body.p: A coloring of the lines or separators can be encoded by using the attribute value combination @rendition="#hrBlue" or @rendition="#hrRed".
